DIGCLASS 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

    Translate ISCO08 to SIOPS

    isco08_to_siops.Rd

    This function translates a vector of ISCO08 codes to SIOPS codes using the translation table stored in the all_schemas$isco08_to_siops data frame.

    Usage

    isco08_to_siops(x)

    Arguments

    x

    A character vector of ISCO08 codes.

    Value

    A character vector of SIOPS codes.

    Examples

    library(dplyr)

ess %>% mutate(SIOPS = isco08_to_siops(isco08))
#> # A tibble: 56,752 × 6
#>    isco68 isco88 isco08 emplno self_employed SIOPS
#>     <dbl>  <dbl>  <dbl>  <dbl>         <dbl> <dbl>
#>  1    140   3111     NA      0             0  NA  
#>  2   3210   3431   4120      0             0  50.9
#>  3   2119   1210   1120      0             0  64.5
#>  4   1320   2320   2330      0             0  62.6
#>  5   8550   7137   7411      0             0  44.0
#>  6   5401   5131   5311      0             0  23  
#>  7     NA     NA     NA      0             0  NA  
#>  8   1593   2419   2432      0             0  57  
#>  9   1930   3460   2635      0             0  53.9
#> 10   1950   2444   2643      0             0  65.7
#> # … with 56,742 more rows
